content: पट्टः, --ट्टं {@--1@} A slab, tablet (for writing upon), plate in general; शिलापट्टमधिशयाना <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; so भालपट्ट &c. {@--2@} A royal grant or edict; <ls>Y. 1. 319.</ls> {@--3@} A tiara, diadem; <ls>R. 18. 44.</ls> {@--4@} A strip; निर्मोकपट्टाः फणिभिर्विमुक्ताः <ls>R. 16. 17.</ls> {@--5@} Silk; पट्टोपधानं <ls>K. 17</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 74</ls>; so पट्टांशुकं. {@--6@} Fine or coloured cloth, cloth in general. {@--7@} An upper garment; <ls>Bk. 10. 60.</ls> {@--8@} A fillet or cloth worn round the head, a turban; especially, a coloured silk turban; <ls>Ratn. 1. 4.</ls> {@--9@} A throne. {@--10@} A chair or stool. {@--11@} A shield. {@--12@} A grinding stone. {@--13@} A place where four roads meet. {@--14@} A city, town. {@--15@} A bandage, ligature. --ट्टी {@--1@} An ornament for the forehead. {@--2@} A horse's girth.
